        public void wizat(java.lang.String location,
         java.lang.String command)
        Allows an immortal to perform actions in a different location than where the immortal is.
        Parameters:
        location - The room name where the action will be performed
        command - The command that will be performed

      • imm

        public void imm(java.lang.String Line)
        Allows the imm to send a global message. Highlighted in yellow This gives more prominence to a message than OOC or IC.
        Parameters:
        Line - The string that will be sent to players

        Forces a user or an NPC to perform a certain action

        user - The name of the user or NPC
        command - The action to be performed

      • goldeneyes

        public void goldeneyes(boolean on)
        Toggles goldeneyes. This is the ability to see invisible objects, no matter their level of expertise, see invisible people, and be able to see in the dark
        Parameters:
        on -

        Check the last time that a user has logged in

      • create

        public void create(java.lang.String type,
          java.lang.String name)
        Allows an immortal to create NPCs and objects in the room that they are in.
        Parameters:
        type - Whether it is an NPC or an object. (npc/obj)
        name - The name of the object or NPC to create

      • mute

        public void mute(java.lang.String user)
        Shuts a player up. The player will still be able to OPRAY to immortals
        Parameters:
        user - The name of the user

      • unmute

        public void unmute(java.lang.String user)
        Allows a player to chat again.
        Parameters:
        user - The name of the user

      • gotoOut

        public void gotoOut(java.lang.String text)
        Setting to change the text displayed when an immortal gotos out of a room
        Parameters:
        text - New text to display

      • purgeUser

        public void purgeUser(java.lang.String name)
        'purge ' will make the player drop everything in their inventory and then be reset back to the start location of the game
        Parameters:
        name - Either 'room' or the name of a user

      • purgeRoom

        public void purgeRoom(java.lang.String location)
        Purge will delete NPCs and Objects from a room. Command 'purge room' Purge can also remove players.
        Parameters:
        location - Either 'room' or the name of a user

      • reCast

        public void reCast(java.lang.String username)
        Randomizes the Str, Int, Dex, etc. of a player. These stats are randomly generated when a player is created. This command will regenerate the base stats
        Parameters:
        username - Name of the user

      • healingLight

        public void healingLight(java.lang.String username)
        Returns a user to full health, mana, and move points.
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the user

      • show

        public void show(java.lang.String command)
        Shows any number of stats. NPCs in rooms, room names, user stats, etc.
        Parameters:
        command - The object to get stats on

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts the server down

      • snoop

        public void snoop(java.lang.String user)
        Allows an immortal to see everything that a user types.
        Parameters:
        user - The name of the user

      • stopSnoop

        public void stopSnoop()
        Stops all snooping

      • mindMeld

        public void mindMeld(java.lang.String npc)
        Allows an immortal to control a mob
        Parameters:
        npc - The name of the NPC to control
